Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: Small jar with an oval vertical profile, a rounded base, restricted mouth and simple lip. Both surfaces are light brown and light pink in colour. No evidence of a slip is visible and the exterior surface is spotted with a few black patches resulting from fire clouding. The exterior surface bears a decoration of small horizontal incisions that are randomly placed. The entire vessel has been carefully polished.
